tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE machine_learning_models (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    training_data TEXT[],
    prediction_column TEXT,
    prediction_result JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE model_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    train_loss FLOAT,
    val_loss FLOAT,
    epoch INT
);

CREATE TABLE predictions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    data_point TEXT,
    prediction FLOAT,
    prediction_date TIMESTAMP
);
